remarks: The identity of the ring of all polynomial matrices over the ring ` R ` is a constant polynomial matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
statement:
cpmatsrngpmat.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
cpmatsrngpmat.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
cpmatsrngpmat.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
1elcpmat $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` C ) e. S ) $.
